title: How to Earn a Balloon Badge in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Look at the Balloon Badge.
steps.description:
You'll need to shoot down a certain amount of present balloons around town with your slingshot. Bronze rank: 30 presents from balloons
Silver rank: 100 presents from balloons
Gold rank: 200 presents from balloons

steps.headline: Locate Phineas.
steps.description: When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days.

steps.headline: Talk to him.
steps.description: At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons.

steps.headline: View your badge on your Town Pass Card.
steps.description: Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.

text:
Look at the Balloon Badge. You'll need to shoot down a certain amount of present balloons around town with your slingshot. Bronze rank: 30 presents from balloons
Silver rank: 100 presents from balloons
Gold rank: 200 presents from balloons Accomplish the minimum amount required.  Locate Phineas. When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days. Talk to him. At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons. View your badge on your Town Pass Card. Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.
